message.content:
# 1. Verificar PostgreSQL
  systemctl status postgresql
  ps aux | grep postgres

  # 2. Verificar servicios corriendo
  pm2 status
  docker ps

  # 3. Verificar conexiÃ³n a base de datos
  psql -h localhost -U postgres -d moonyetis_production -c "\dt"

  # 4. Verificar APIs de Fractal Bitcoin
  curl -X POST https://fractal-api.unisat.io/query -H "Content-Type: application/json"

  # 5. Verificar logs de la aplicaciÃ³n
  pm2 logs
  # o
  tail -f /var/log/moonyetis/app.log
